descriptionHtml:
This is a re-vamp of the mod 
Riverwood Fishing Shack by RyyZan
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24341

[size=+2][color=Red][b]What is it?[/b][/color][/size]

It changes and adds a few things.
Made it more \"playable\" maybe as a player home.
The Clothes Storage, Armor Storage, Weapons Chest, Boots Storage & Strongbox are all safe storage.
Added 2 (two) weapons using the iron dagger and hunting bow look.
made them stronger and added custom enchantment on them.
maybe overpowered for a low level but wouldnt be for long.

[size=+2][color=Red][b]Requirements?[/b][/color][/size]
Skyrim and Hearthfires

[size=+2][color=Red][b]Updates?[/b][/color][/size]
Bug Fixes if any.
User suggestions.

[size=+2][color=Red][b]Bugs[/b][/color][/size]
Chickens may sometimes appear in the cabin or under the hen house.
Not sure how to fix this yet.

[size=+2][color=Red][b]History[/b][/color][/size]

26-4-2013
First Realease

26-4-2013
Update
Fishing Hatchery should now work normal.
Added few more lights and plants.
A boots chest and strongbox.

29-4-2013
Update
Added Map Marker
Made \"Fishermans Friends\" Temperable
Added and moved clutter

[size=+4][color=Yellow][b]My Other Mods[/b][/color][/size]

author: Fortie
